Terrorsaur:



Terrorsaur squawked lightly and thrusted himself into the air, 
following Dark Mouse.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> DarkMouse::
> "This is just a transport pod, no CR tanks in it. You can come with 
> us to the bas and use the CR there if you want. I'll vouch for you. 
> Your an old friend." she smiled warmly up at Terrorsaur. She 
> motioned  for him to follow her. "Come on, we'll get there in short 
> order and you can be in a tank in no time."
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> > Quickstrike/ Terrorsaur:
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > "Thought ya were uh Maxie," Quickstrike said and walked back to 
the 
> > watching spot by the ramp. 
> > 
> > 
> > Terrorsaur turned his head up at Dark Mouse. "Where are the CR 
> tanks 
> > here?"
